summary: An email forwarded to SDNY prosecutors on January 30, 2020, from an individual claiming to be a victim of stalking and intimidation. The sender makes numerous allegations about a cover-up in the Shannan Gilbert case, connections between attorney John Ray and figures like Tom Spota and James Burke, and links John Ray to Jeffrey Epstein via a Swedish madam named Barbro Ehnbom. The document details observations from a 2019 trial, personal interactions with John Ray, and claims of evidence tampering and witness intimidation.
